市场有风险 投资需谨慎: Market risk investment needs to be cautious
当市场价达到触发价时，将按计划设定的价格和数量进行下单: When the market price reaches the trigger price, the price and quantity set according to the plan will be placed
当使用市场价卖出时，系统会根据您设置的卖出数量在市场上从高到低扫单，直至数量卖完: When using the market price to sell, the system will scan the market from high to low depending on the number of sales you set, until the quantity is sold out
以市场上最优价格卖出: Sell at the best price on the market
以市场上最优价格买入: Buy at the best price on the market
当使用市价买入时，系统会根据您预留的金额在市场上从低到高进行扫单，直至金额用完为: When using the market price to buy, the system will sweep orders from low to high in the market according to the amount you reserve until the amount is used up
为保证资金安全，请在交易前实名认证: In order to ensure the safety of funds, please register before the transaction.
为保证交易顺畅，请在交易前绑定银行卡: In order to ensure smooth trading, please bind the bank before the transaction.卡
您已支付款项给对方, 请确认是否取消订单!: You have already paid the other party, please confirm whether to cancel the order!
请使用绑定的银行卡完成付款，付款时填写以下信息: Please use the bundled bank card to complete the payment, fill in the following information when paying
商家有一个未完成买单，无法继续买入，完成后方可进行买卖: The merchant has an unfilled buy order and cannot continue to buy.
商家当天取消3笔交易，将禁止当天C2C买卖功能: If the merchant cancels 3 transactions on the same day, the C2C trading function will be banned on the same day.
商家当天被申诉3次以上，禁止当天C2C买卖功能: The merchant was appealed more than 3 times on the same day, prohibiting the C2C trading function on the same day.
大于5万的付款，请务必将单笔金额拆分为5万以内分批转账，否则将延迟到账: For payments greater than 50,000, please be sure to split the single amount into 50,000 or less, otherwise the payment will be delayed.
请确认您正在访问: Please confirm that you are visiting
点击图片刷新验证码: Click image to refresh the verification code
请输入正确的手机号: please enter a valid phone number
请先同意服务条款: Please agree to the terms of service first
输入8-20位密码 包含数字,字母: Enter 8-20 digit password containing numbers, letters
请输入手机验证码: Please enter your phone verification code
请输入6位手机验证码: Please enter a 6-digit mobile phone verification code
请输入数字邀请码: Please enter a numeric invitation code
请输入邮箱验证码: Please enter the email verification code
请输入6位邮箱验证码: Please enter a 6-digit password verification code
